tests.query: SELECT AVG(trip_time_in_secs), STDDEV(trip_time_in_secs) FROM trips WHERE passenger_count = 9
SELECT passenger_count AS pc, COUNT(*) FROM trips WHERE passenger_count IN (7,8,9,10) GROUP BY pc ORDER BY pc
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT passenger_count) FROM trips WHERE trip_time_in_secs > 5000
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trips WHERE trip_time_in_secs > 2500 AND passenger_count <> 4
SELECT MIN(passenger_count), MAX(passenger_count), MEDIAN(passenger_count), SUM(passenger_count) FROM trips WHERE trip_time_in_secs < 60
